Description:
Detects Windows command lines that miss a space before or after the /c flag when running a command using the cmd.exe.
This could be a sign of obfuscation of a fat finger problem (typo by the developer).


Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cmd.EXE Missing Space Characters Execution Anomaly
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%cmd.exe/c%' or command like '%\cmd/c%' or command like '%"cmd/c%' or command like '%cmd.exe/k%' or command like '%\cmd/k%' or command like '%"cmd/k%' or command like '%cmd.exe/r%' or command like '%\cmd/r%' or command like '%"cmd/r%') or (command like '%/cwhoami%' or command like '%/cpowershell%' or command like '%/cschtasks%' or command like '%/cbitsadmin%' or command like '%/ccertutil%' or command like '%/kwhoami%' or command like '%/kpowershell%' or command like '%/kschtasks%' or command like '%/kbitsadmin%' or command like '%/kcertutil%') or (command like '%cmd.exe /c%' or command like '%cmd /c%' or command like '%cmd.exe /k%' or command like '%cmd /k%' or command like '%cmd.exe /r%' or command like '%cmd /r%')) and  not ((command like '%cmd.exe /c %' or command like '%cmd /c %' or command like '%cmd.exe /k %' or command like '%cmd /k %' or command like '%cmd.exe /r %' or command like '%cmd /r %') or (command like '%appdata\local\programs\microsoft vs code\resources\app\node_modules%' and command like '%cmd.exe/c .' and command = 'cmd.exe /c')))
